ch.nolix.core.license

Class LicenseHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.license.LicenseHub

  • public class LicenseHub
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to manage licenses at a central point. From this class an instance cannot be created.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addLicense(License license)
      Adds the given license manager if the license hub does not contain already the given license.
